name: Return the Standing Orders for an Account with no Standing Orders

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for Standing Orders on the following NSC and Account:
| nsc | account |
| 931012 | 26469075 |

And the following Standing Orders should be returned
| standingOrderNumber | receiverName | frequencyName | nextPaymentAmount | nextPaymentDate | finalPaymentDate | statusName | setupDate | lastAmendedDate | recieverAccount/nsc | recieverAccount/accountNumber | recieverAccount/bic | recieverAccount/iban | senderName | senderReference | receiverReference | senderNSC | senderAccountNo | remittanceInformation | firstPaymentDate | startAmount | firstPaymentHolidayMonthName | secondPaymentHolidayMonthName | finalPaymentAmount | changeAmount | changeDate | lastCharge | consecutiveFailedPayments |

children.description: Validate standing orders: | standingOrderNumber | receiverName | frequencyName | nextPaymentAmount | nextPaymentDate | finalPaymentDate | statusName | setupDate | lastAmendedDate | recieverAccount/nsc | recieverAccount/accountNumber | recieverAccount/bic | recieverAccount/iban | senderName | senderReference | receiverReference | senderNSC | senderAccountNo | remittanceInformation | firstPaymentDate | startAmount | firstPaymentHolidayMonthName | secondPaymentHolidayMonthName | finalPaymentAmount | changeAmount | changeDate | lastCharge | consecutiveFailedPayments |

title: Return the Standing Orders for an Account with no Standing Orders
